title: FDA Has No Plans to Put Black Box Warning on Covid Vaccines, Commissioner Says
description: FDA Commissioner Dr. Marty Makary says the agency has no plans to put a black box warning on Covid-19 vaccines. He says a recommendation was made, but it won't be adopted since the vaccines have changed since they first came out. He speaks on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: FDA Commissioner Dr. Marty Makary says the agency has no plans to put a black box warning on Covid-19 vaccines. He says a recommendation was made, but it won't be adopted since the vaccines have changed since they first came out. He speaks on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
